title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5120.1 - Transportation of video lottery terminals into, within and out-of-State
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5120.1 - Transportation of video lottery terminals into, within and out-of-State

State Regulations
(a) Prior to the
transport or movement of any video lottery terminal from one authorized
location to another authorized location within, or out of, the State, a video
lottery gaming vendor or other person causing such video lottery terminal to be
transported or moved shall first notify the commission in writing using the
commission approved shipment form. (b) No delivery of video lottery terminals or
equipment shall be made to a video lottery gaming agent facility unless and
until that facility has been issued a license to engage in video lottery
gaming. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

5120.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
